alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 5:55AM AKST until January 23 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW ACROSS THE CENTRAL PANHANDLE... .Snowfall continues across the panhandle. Dry snow will become wetter through the event with central areas of the panhandle changing to freezing rain and rain. For northern areas, it is possible that snow lasts longer into Tuesday morning. Freezing rain may mix in with snow across parts of the central and northern panhandle. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Skagway, Haines, and Klukwan including the Haines and Klondike Highways. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 6 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest snowfall rates will be during the afternoon and evening hours on Monday. There is significant uncertainty regarding anticipated snow totals. Snow totals may prove lower than anticipated should precipitation have trouble moving northward.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
